amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: \ SEC. __. None of the funds appropriated or otherwise made available by this Act shall be obligated or expended by the Secretary of the Army or his designee to award a contract to any contractor if the Defense Contract Audit Agency has determined that more than $100,000,000 of the contractor's costs for contracts involving work in Iraq under one or more Army contracts were unreasonable.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waxman amendment (A046) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 225 (Roll no. 60).
